db:info.db:title: Qt for iOS - Building from Source

db:abstract.db:para: Provides instructions to build Qt from source for iOS platform.

db:article.db:para: Building Qt for iOS from sources requires Xcode with command-line tools installed. This can be done within Xcode from Preferences > Downloads > Components > Command Line Tools.
Qt sources can be obtained either by cloning the repositories or downloading the source package(s).
We can then configure and build Qt. This is done from the Qt top directory:
For other configure options, see Qt Configure Options.

db:note.db:para: A default build will include both simulator and device libraries. If you want to build for a single target, use the -sdk argument with either iphoneos or iphonesimulator.
